trans-unit.source: Manages a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en samling av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurfaceManager class is designed to be a container of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> objects.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignSurfaceManager er utformet for å være en beholder for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>objekter.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: It provides common services that handle event routing between designers, property windows, and other global objects.
trans-unit.target: Det gir vanlige tjenester som referansen hendelsen ruting mellom utviklere, egenskapen windows og andre globale objekter.

trans-unit.source: Using DesignSurfaceManager is optional, but it is recommended if you intend to have several designer windows.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av DesignSurfaceManager er valgfritt, men det anbefales hvis du vil ha flere designer windows.

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurfaceManager class provides several design-time services automatically.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignSurfaceManager inneholder flere utformingen automatisk.

trans-unit.source: You can override each of these services by replacing them in the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre hvert enkelt av disse tjenestene ved å erstatte dem i det beskyttede <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil erstatte en tjeneste, overstyre konstruktøren kall base og gjøre endringer i det beskyttede <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.ServiceContainer%2A>

trans-unit.source: All services added to the service container that implement the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface are disposed when the design surface manager is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Alle tjenester som er lagt til i beholderen som implementerer den <xref:System.IDisposable>grensesnittet er fjernet ved utformingen surface lederen er fjernet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurfaceManager class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface as the default service.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DesignSurfaceManager gir den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>grensesnitt som standardtjeneste.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> provides a global eventing mechanism for designer events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>har en global hendelser for designer hendelser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: With this mechanism, an application is informed when a designer becomes active.
trans-unit.target: Med denne mekanisme er et program informert når designer aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: The service provides a collection of designers and a single place where global objects, such as the Properties window, can monitor selection change events.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesten inneholder en samling av utviklere og ett sted der globale objekter, for eksempel Egenskaper-vinduet kan overvåke valg endres hendelser.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: En overordnet leverandør.

trans-unit.source: Service requests are forwarded to this provider if they cannot be resolved by the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteforespørsler videresendes til denne leverandøren hvis de ikke kan løses ved utformingen surface lederen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the active designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den aktive utformeren.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDesignSurface property should be set by the designer's user interface whenever a designer becomes the active window.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDesignSurface-egenskapen må angis av brukergrensesnittet for det designer når designer er det aktive vinduet.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property works with the default implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface to notify interested parties that a new designer is now active.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av denne egenskapen fungerer med standard implementering av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>grensesnittet for å varsle interessert parter en ny designer er nå aktiv.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: If you provide your own implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, you should override this property to notify your service appropriately.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir din egen implementering av <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, du kan overstyre denne egenskapen til å varsle tjenesten på riktig måte.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: This property can be set to `null`, indicating that no designer is active.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan settes til `null`, som angir at ingen designer er aktiv.

trans-unit.source: The active designer.
trans-unit.target: Den aktive utformeren.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the currently active designer changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den aktive utformeren endres.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av en utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: En ny utforming surface forekomst.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a design surface.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av en utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: If you want to conveniently add additional per-designer services, use the `parentProvider` parameter to provide a service provider for this design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til per designer tilleggstjenester enkelt, kan du bruke den `parentProvider` parameteren til å angi en leverandør for utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDesignSurface method creates a merged service provider that can satisfy service requests from both the given service provider as well as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> itself.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDesignSurface oppretter en sammenslått leverandør som overholder tjenesteforespørsler fra begge angitt leverandør i tillegg til <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>seg selv.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: The CreateDesignSurface method then passes this service provider into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDesignSurface deretter sender denne leverandøren i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A> returns the design surface, the CreateDesignSurface method tries to obtain the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>.
trans-unit.target: Etter <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A>returnerer utformingsoverflaten CreateDesignSurface metoden prøver å hente <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it is present, and if it is the instance of the service that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> provided by default, the CreateDesignSurface method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den finnes, og hvis den forekomsten av tjenesten som <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>angitt som standard metoden CreateDesignSurface opphøyer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.DesignerCreated> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: En overordnet leverandør.

trans-unit.source: A new merged service provider will be created that will first ask this provider for a service, and then delegate any failures to the design surface manager object.
trans-unit.target: En ny sammenslåtte tjenesteleverandør opprettes som skal be først denne leverandøren for en tjeneste, og delegere eventuelle feil som kan utformingen surface manager-objektet.

trans-unit.source: This merged provider will be passed into the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore*> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne sammenslåtte leverandøren blir sendt til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore*>metoden.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurfaceCore*>

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: En ny utforming surface forekomst.

trans-unit.source: parentProvider is .
trans-unit.target: parentProvideris .

trans-unit.source: Implementation that creates the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Implementering som oppretter utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDesignSurfaceCore method is called by both <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateDesignSurfaceCore kalles etter både <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A>metoder.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.CreateDesignSurface%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is the implementation that actually creates the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Det er implementeringen som oppretter faktisk utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation just returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering returnerer bare en ny <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: You may override this method to provide a custom object that derives from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre denne metoden for å angi et egendefinert objekt som er avledet fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>klassen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface>

trans-unit.source: A service provider to pass to the design surface.
trans-unit.target: En leverandør skal sendes til utformingsoverflaten.

trans-unit.source: This is either an instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref> or an object that implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider>, and represents a merge between the service provider of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref> class and an externally passed provider.
trans-unit.target: Dette er enten en forekomst av <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref> eller et objekt som implementerer <xref:System.IServiceProvider>, og representerer en fletting mellom tjenesteleverandøren for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref> klassen og et eksternt angitte leverandøren.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: A new design surface instance.
trans-unit.target: En ny utforming surface forekomst.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a designer is created.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når designer er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a designer is disposed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når designer er fjernet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of design surfaces.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av utformingen overflater.

trans-unit.source: The DesignSurfaces property is implemented directly on top of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, so if you provide your own implementation of that service, this property uses your implementation.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DesignSurfaces er implementert på <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>, så hvis du angir din egen implementering av tjenesten, bruker denne egenskapen implementeringen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: A collection of design surfaces that are currently hosted by the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: En samling av utformingen overflatene som for øyeblikket vert av utformingen surface manager.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The public Dispose method follows the standard <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: Offentlig fjerningsmetoden følger standarden <xref:System.IDisposable>mønsteret.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method destroys the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden ødelegger transportbehandling utformingen overflaten.

trans-unit.source: It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement <xref:System.IDisposable> to also be disposed.
trans-unit.target: Det også disposes beholderen, som fører til at alle tjenester som implementerer <xref:System.IDisposable>til også bli fjernet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: Beskyttede versjonen av denne metoden er `virtual` og følger normal <xref:System.IDisposable>mønsteret.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>ikke har noen opprinnelig kode til å rydde opp, den ikke har en sluttbehandler som kaller <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: If you need to call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, you must add a finalizer yourself.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil kalle <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>, du må legge til en sluttbehandler.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: The public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A> method follows the standard <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: Offentligheten <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>metoden følger standarden <xref:System.IDisposable>mønsteret.</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method destroys the design surface manager.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden ødelegger transportbehandling utformingen overflaten.

trans-unit.source: It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement <xref:System.IDisposable> to also be disposed.
trans-unit.target: Det også disposes beholderen, som fører til at alle tjenester som implementerer <xref:System.IDisposable>til også bli fjernet.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal <xref:System.IDisposable> pattern.
trans-unit.target: Beskyttede versjonen av denne metoden er `virtual` og følger normal <xref:System.IDisposable>mønsteret.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls Dispose.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>ikke har noen opprinnelig kode til å rydde opp, den ikke har en sluttbehandler som kaller avhending.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: If you need to call Dispose, you must add a finalizer yourself.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger å kalle avhending, må du legge en sluttbehandler selv.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()`metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>referanser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceManager>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets a service in the design surface manager’s service container.
trans-unit.target: Henter en tjeneste i utformingen surface til den overordnede tjenestebeholderen.

trans-unit.source: The GetService method forwards to any service provider that was given to the design surface manager at construction time.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetService videresender til en leverandør, som ble gitt til utformingen surface lederen under bygging.

trans-unit.source: The service type to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestetypen til å hente.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements, or is a derived class of, the given service type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the service does not exist in the service container.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer eller er en avledet type, angitte tjenestetypen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis tjenesten ikke finnes i beholderen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the global selection changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når det globale valget endres.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the active designer's selection of component set changes.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når den aktive utformeren valg av komponenten angitt endringer.

trans-unit.source: This is mapped through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService> interface.
trans-unit.target: Dette er tilordnet til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>grensesnittet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the design surface manager's ServiceContainer.
trans-unit.target: Henter den utformingen surface overordnedes ServiceContainer.

trans-unit.source: The design surface manager's ServiceContainer.
trans-unit.target: Utformingen surface til den overordnede ServiceContainer.
